page.title: 09Towerlands Equestrian Centre
page.content: { Towerlands Equestrian Centre}is situated on the{B1053}road on the outskirts of{Braintree.}It occupies 76 acres of land. {Tom Hunnable}started it in 1979. A barn on the original small holding was converted into an indoor{riding {school.}There are facilities for{show {jumping}and{dressage.}There is a swimming pool for horses which is particularly good for their legs. There are 40 stables and 6 paddocks. The arena is 28x56m. The floor is made of rolled sand, soil and shavings. A wooden floor covers this for{dances, craft fairs}and other events. The sports hall is used for {tennis, squash, badminton, football, {basketball}and{netball.}There is an indoor{bowling}green. In 1985 a new{golf course}opened.
